dude what do i do i instaled everithing works great but i got  a mesage from skype lol and then the whole game freezed i closed it the i presed start game i didnt do anything so i thought maybe i should delete it and reinstale it so i deleted the file C/sega/houseofthedead  restared my pc then i i lauched it and it is only lets me to star the game or delete i pres start dosent do anything (becouse i deleted) the i pres delete i says somekinda file conot fe found etc canot delete what do i do

Okay here is how you do it-you need Daemon tools. You will see .bin and .cue files. You need to load and run through daemon tools (which while i am sure there are other .cue readers out there, this is the only one I am aware of that works with extreme ease). simple, really. When you get a torrent you do not know how to run-check the extention of the file.

 If you do not recognize that .whateverhere look it up-chances are you'll find info regarding how to use it, what it does, etc.
